transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Hello. Haan. Hi, good evening. Main Humera bol rahi hun. Aap Sudeep baat kar rahe ho?

Customer: Haan, boliye.

Executive: Sudeep ji, main IndiaMART head office se senior manager baat kar rahi thi. Actually, abhi se aapki baat hui hogi services ko leke kuch tenders aur by leads conversion mein kuch problem face kar rahe the aap. To aap haan, main wahi jaanna chah rahi thi ki kya problems face kar rahe hain kyunki aapne mail bhi kara hua hai matlab by leads ka ki by leads se aapko response nahi aa raha hai. Right aur aapko kuch acha nahi hai.

Customer: Dekhiye jo by leads aa raha hai. Matlab jo by leads aa raha hai, aapka jo service provider hai wo inquiry kar raha hai usi ko aap leads pe de rahe ho. Thik hai na?

Customer: Jo service provider hai uska ye aap leads pe humko de rahe ho to main jab usko consume kar raha hu to mera consume show ho raha hai lekin mera kaam khatam kuch nahi ho raha hai.

Customer: Haan, to ye to nahi hona chahiye na.

Executive: Thik hai. Agar koi service provider service provider ko lead bheje to wo to lead nahi hota hai na.

Executive: Ek cheez aapko main batati hu isme sir, ye aapko jo problem aa rahi hai na, ye bahut common problem hai kyunki aapka jo catalog hai na sir, wo already waha pe visible to hota hai aapka inki. Dekhiye main Google ke through IndiaMART ki website pe jaata hai waha se search karta hai, check karta hai. To isme hota kya hai ki customer free hai.

Executive: Aapka product use dikh raha hai, wo aapko call karke is tarah ke question bhi puchta hai service providing ke liye bhi aur unke business ke liye bhi.

Customer: Are ye to aap lead de rahe ho. Suniye, suniye, suniye. Mera baat suniye, suniye.

Executive: Suno, hum isse thik kaise kar sakte hain, main aapko wo batati hu.

Customer: Haan, boliye.

Executive: Thik hai.

Executive: Haan ji, boliye.

Customer: Suniye, haan, suniye, boliye please, boliye.

Customer: Baat aisa hai, aapne to humko bola weekly mein 18 leads aapko denge, thik hai na? To main jab ek service provider ka ko call karta hu to aapka lead pe count ho ja raha hai.

Customer: Thik hai na? To mera jab jab koi kaam kar raha nahi hota hai to uska lead khata hai humko dikhata hai by leads. Aap leads buy karo.

Customer: Hum to fake leads pe to usko consume kar rahe hain.

Customer: To hamara fayda kya ho raha hai? Main to jo leads pe consume kar raha hu wo fake hai.

Customer: Wo koi service provider mang raha hai, koi aise hi call kiya wo ho raha hai to humko to fake leads pe hum consume kar rahe hain. To hamara aaj tak ke total.

Customer: Total jo bhi hai.

Executive: Dekhiye, aap ye keh rahe hain ki aapne jo service list kari hai aap wo service dete hain, aapka dene ka kaam hai. Right?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Domestic service aap dete hain.

Customer: Main to khud gadi deta hu. Main to gadi dene lene ke liye nahi aaya. Main gadi dene ke liye phone kiya hu.

Executive: Dekhiye.

Customer: Mere paas 100 call recorded hai, 100 phone. 100 call recorded hai.

Customer: Humne jitne ko phone kiya sara ka call record hai.

Customer: Sara aadmi ka call record hai. Boliye.

Executive: Okay. Ab dekhiye isme sir apan kar kya sakte hain abhi isko improve karne ke liye cheezon ke liye main aapko wo bata deti hu. Thoda better banne ke liye jisse ki isme improvement ho sake. Thik hai? Us cheez ko thoda sa kafi had tak sudharne ke liye isme apan karenge kya? Aapka jo catalog hai uski description mention nahi hai aur usme thik hai aap kya kaam karte hain ya sari cheeze jo hai kyunki just name likha hua hai. Jaise ki aap dekhiye domestic.

Customer: Aap jo baat nahi samajh pa rahe aap apna kahani sunate ja rahe hain.

Customer: Aap apna kahani suna raha hai.

Customer: Hum aap to humko leads de rahe hain 18 leads. 18 leads mein hum fake leads ko jab consume kar rahe hain to hamare paas jo original lead hai usko hum consume nahi kar rahe hain us time aap keh rahe hain buy leads. Aap buy leads buy karo fir aap dekho.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Ye kahani hai.

Customer: Thik se aawaz nahi aa rahi sir aapki.

Customer: Aapka jo fake leads jo ja raha hai fake leads ko main consume kar raha hu to mera to leads khatam ho raha hai.

Executive: Main aapko ye keh rahi hu sir ki thoda thik se aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi hai. Main aapko ye bata rahi hu ki is problem ko hum solve kaise kar sakte hain. Ye bahut common problem hai sabko ye aati hai.

Executive: Bahut common cheez hai ye but usko thik kar sakte hain.

Customer: Humko to ek baat lag raha hai ki aap log aap log ka jo dhandha hai aap log aadmi bazar mein chod rakhe ho ki bhai tum subah sham ek baar karke IndiaMART mein call karo call karke batao ye hai hum isko lead distribute kar denge wo chahe fake hi ho.

Customer: Jaisa Modi ji voter create karta hai aap log aisa lead create karte ho.

Customer: Chori chori chori lead lead ko kya hai lead to koi hai nahi koi fake aadmi ko khada karke bol do tum phone karo bhai isko lead karo.

Executive: Sir, main aapko ek baar aur call laga rahi hu. Sir, aawaz mujhe thik se nahi aa raha hai. Main ek baar aur aapko call laga rahi hu. Thik hai? Ek minute rukiye aap mujhe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fake buyleads.

- Service providers are inquiring, leads are counted.

- Consuming fake leads, no benefit.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the common problem.

- Executive offered to improve catalog description.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call again due to voice issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake leads, catalog, service provider
